Title: Shadows
Plot: When an unseen force commits several murders where a young woman is present, Mulder suspects that it is the spirit of the woman's former boss protecting her, while Scully believes the boss merely faked his own death.
GuestStars: Barry Primus, Lisa Waltz, Lorena Gale, Veena Sood, Deryl Hayes, Kelli Fox, Tom Pickett, Tom Heaton, Janie Woods-Morris, Nora McLellan, Anna Ferguson
